segment.source: Customize a Data Table
segment.target: Customize a Data Table

segment.source: Customize a Data Table
segment.target: Customize a Data Table

segment.source: Customize a Data Table
segment.target: Customize a Data Table

segment.source: You can customize the data tables that are associated with each graph in several ways.
segment.target: You can customize the data tables that are associated with each graph in several ways.

segment.source: To sort by a column
segment.target: To sort by a column

segment.source: Click the header bar of the desired column.
segment.target: Click the header bar of the desired column.

segment.source: Click the header bar again to reverse the sorting.
segment.target: Click the header bar again to reverse the sorting.

segment.source: To change the column selection
segment.target: To change the column selection

segment.source: Right-click the header bar, and select or clear the checkbox next to columns that you do not want to see.
segment.target: Right-click the header bar, and select or clear the checkbox next to columns that you do not want to see.

segment.source: When you are finished, click Done.
segment.target: When you are finished, click Done.

segment.source: To make a column into a key
segment.target: To make a column into a key

segment.source: If you do not see the vertical gold bar, scroll to the right.
segment.target: If you do not see the vertical gold bar, scroll to the right.

segment.source: Drag the column that you want to make into a key to the left of the vertical gold bar.
segment.target: Drag the column that you want to make into a key to the left of the vertical gold bar.

segment.source: To make a column into a graphing element
segment.target: To make a column into a graphing element

segment.source: Drag the column that you want to make into a graphing element to the right of the vertical blue bar.
segment.target: Drag the column that you want to make into a graphing element to the right of the vertical blue bar.

segment.source: For a list of columns that can be made into graphing elements, see Data Tables.
segment.target: For a list of columns that can be made into graphing elements, see Data Tables.

segment.source: To freeze columns
segment.target: To freeze columns

segment.source: Right-click the table, and click Show/Hide Freeze Bars.
segment.target: Right-click the table, and click Show/Hide Freeze Bars.

segment.source: Drag the columns that you want to freeze between the vertical gray bars.
segment.target: Drag the columns that you want to freeze between the vertical gray bars.

segment.source: The horizontal scroll bar then scrolls only between those columns.
segment.target: The horizontal scroll bar then scrolls only between those columns.
